results.content: Found this course really helpful to understand web accessibility from end user point of view. I typically use ANDI for accessibility testing but coupled with NVDA makes it much more effective.
results.content_html: Found this course really helpful to understand web accessibility from end user point of view. I typically use ANDI for accessibility testing but coupled with NVDA makes it much more effective.

results.content: Trainer's accent is quite strong so have to concentrate, but he articulates well. Useful information, but maybe more for people who need to download and use it every day rather than use it for accessibility testing.
results.content_html: Trainer's accent is quite strong so have to concentrate, but he articulates well. Useful information, but maybe more for people who need to download and use it every day rather than use it for accessibility testing.
